title: Message to the Annual Convention of the Zionist Organization of America.
text:
My dear Mr. Slomovitz:

Please say for me to the members of the Zionist Organization of America, gathered in annual convention at Detroit on June 30th, that I pray [p.206] their deliberations may be, as always, richly fruitful in that spiritual wisdom for which the Jewish race has been noteworthy in all ages.

Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Philip Slomovitz, President of the Zionist District of Detroit, Detroit, Michigan]
